The Earl of Danby vindicated: in reflections upon a paper intituled, Some reflections upon the E. of Danby, in relation to the murder of Sir Edmund-bury Godfry. In a letter to a friend, / from Mr. Christian. Christian, Edward.
4 p.
Printed for Freeman Collins, [London : 1679]
Caption title. Signed at end: Edw. Christian. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
